Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS

Title: Enacts the "H2 energy scale up act"
Summary: Enacts the "H2 energy scale up act"; authorizes the New York state energy research and development authority to administer a program to provide funds related to enabling clean hydrogen projects.
LawCode: Amd ยง1854, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing the New York state energy research and development authority to administer a program to provide funds related to enabling clean hydrogen projects
